body_html: It's still a bit surprising for me that a test required this, because as far as I can see the old code didn't account for infinities at all (it would do a - b, and this gives you a NaN IIRC). Are you sure this is the case?
body_text: It's still a bit surprising for me that a test required this, because as far as I can see the old code didn't account for infinities at all (it would do a - b, and this gives you a NaN IIRC). Are you sure this is the case?
body: It's still a bit surprising for me that a test required this, because as far as I can see the old code didn't account for infinities at all (it would do `a - b`, and this gives you a NaN IIRC). Are you sure this is the case?
